cc.text:
I implemented using the center of the bounding box as anchor.I didnâ€™t do the snapping yet, but I think I know how to do it: The SceneAnnotion will keep track of the parentRect and one siblingRect and snap to those. It will create dotted lines as children to visually indicate snapping. 
What I do not know is whether I want to make positioning of annotations with subgrid precision possible. Probably, yes, if I am going to do snapping at all, because otherwise text to text alignment will never be precise, since the centers would be aligned to the grid.
